# unifi_device (Data Source)

Fetches details of a specific device.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `site_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `firmware_version` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ip_address` (String)
- `mac_address` (String)
- `model` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `state` (String)
- `supported` (Boolean)
